text: The Real Scandal of Our Media Tycoons  —  Quote of the year so far, from Donald Trump at Mar-a-Lago yesterday: “In the first term, everyone was fighting me.  This time, everybody wants to be my friend.”  —  Amazing how many friends you can make with just a few well-chosen threats of vengeance against your remaining enemies!

Trump files suit against Iowa pollster Ann Selzer and Des Moines Register newspaper  —  Selzer published a poll days before the election that said Kamala Harris was ahead by 3 percentage points.  Trump ultimately won the state by 13 percentage points.  —  WASHINGTON — Donald Trump is suing Ann Selzer …

Trump asks judge to advance suit against Bob Woodward  —  President-elect Trump's attorney asked a federal judge to move forward with his lawsuit against journalist Bob Woodward over published audio tapes of interviews the famed Watergate reporter conducted with Trump for a 2020 book.

AOC defeated by Connolly in battle for Oversight role … - Ocasio-Cortez, one of House Democrats' most high-profile members, also lost a vote of the House Democratic Steering and Policy Committee on Monday. … - He had the backing of several veteran lawmakers, including former Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.).

How Democrats' Old Guard Beat Out AOC  —  Relatively young House Democrats have beaten more senior members for top committee posts this week.  But the party saw something different in the race between Reps. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and Gerry Connolly.  — Copy

A bomb killed a Russian general in Moscow.  A Ukrainian official says secret service was behind it  —  Live from Moscow after an explosive device planted close to a residential apartment block killed the head of Russia's Nuclear, Biological, and Chemical Defence Forces, Lt. General Igor Kirillov, Russia's Investigative Committee said.

Shock poll: 41 percent of young voters find killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO acceptable  —  A poll found 41 percent of adults under 30 consider the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson acceptable, more than the 40 percent in that demographic who consider it unacceptable.

Musk's influence on X eclipses all members of the incoming Congress, combined  —  The tech billionaire's X account blasts his political messages to an audience far bigger than Trump reaches on the platform, data analysis by The Post shows.  —  From the moment Musk first endorsed Trump …

Judge Broke Rules by Criticizing Justice Alito During Flag Flap  —  Investigation concludes it was an ethics violation to question the ethics of a Supreme Court justice  —  WASHINGTON—Amid collapsing public confidence in U.S. courts, a federal judge has been found culpable of misconduct.

Archivist says Equal Rights Amendment can't be certified as Democrats push Biden to recognize it  —  In a rare joint statement, the archivist and deputy archivist of the United States said Tuesday that the 1970s-era Equal Rights Amendment cannot be certified without further action by Congress or the courts …

Why did murders surge in 2020?  Research says economics, not activism.  —  New analysis from Brookings shows that the increase began not with the death of George Floyd but the erosion of employment.  —  2020 was a tumultuous year, to put it mildly.  There was a presidential election …

McHenry gets a mini portrait  —  Retiring Rep. Patrick McHenry received a parting prank gift as he heads to the congressional exits: A mini portrait to commemorate his time as speaker pro tempore.  House speakers have official portraits commissioned, but the honor is not typically granted …
